Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes the toll-free overnight hours pilot program
Summary: Establishes the toll-free overnight hours pilot program to reduce traffic congestion during peak hours, provide economic relief to drivers and businesses, and encourage efficient freight operations by implementing toll-free travel during designated overnight hours on the New York state thruway; repeals certain provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a toll-free overnight hours pilot program on the New York state thruway; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
